Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayerWarehouse

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerWarehouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerWarehouse extends Object implements Serializable
This class represent the warehouse of the player with 3 rows of storage.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkWarehouse()
    this method tells you if the warehouse respects the rules of the warehouse or not.
    void
    clear()
    this method removes all the resources from the warehouse.
    Map<Resource,​Integer>
    getAllResources()
    this method returns all the resources in the warehouse
    Resource
    getResource​(int row, int col)
    Method getResource takes a row and a column and returns the Resource in that position of the warehouse (or null)
    void
    insertResource​(Resource resource, int row, int col)
    Method insertResource is used to insert a Resource in a position in the warehouse, and it controls that the insertion respects the rules of the warehouse (and that the position wasn't already full)
    Resource
    removeResource​(int row, int col)
    Method removeResource removes a resource from a position in the warehouse and returns the removed Resource (the position is set as null)
    void
    setWarehouse​(PlayerWarehouse newWarehouse)
    this method set all the resources in the warehouse, based on another warehouse you pass.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerWarehouse

      public PlayerWarehouse()

  • Method Details

    • getResource

      public Resource getResource​(int row, int col)
      Method getResource takes a row and a column and returns the Resource in that position of the warehouse (or null)
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of the warehouse you want to select (1,2,3)
      col - is the column of the warehouse you want to select (1,2,3)
      Returns:
      the resource in that position of the warehouse

    • getAllResources

      public Map<Resource,​Integer> getAllResources()
      this method returns all the resources in the warehouse
      Returns:
      A Map of all the resources owned by a player

    • insertResource

      public void insertResource​(Resource resource, int row, int col) throws InvalidWarehouseInsertionException
      Method insertResource is used to insert a Resource in a position in the warehouse, and it controls that the insertion respects the rules of the warehouse (and that the position wasn't already full)
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of the warehouse where you want to insert the resource (1,2,3)
      col - is the column of the warehouse where you want to insert the resource (1,2,3)
      resource - is the resource you want to insert in the warehouse
      Throws:
      InvalidWarehouseInsertionException

    • removeResource

      public Resource removeResource​(int row, int col)
      Method removeResource removes a resource from a position in the warehouse and returns the removed Resource (the position is set as null)
      Parameters:
      row - is the row of the resource you want to remove
      col - is the column of the resource you want to remove
      Returns:
      the removed resource

    • checkWarehouse

      public boolean checkWarehouse()
      this method tells you if the warehouse respects the rules of the warehouse or not.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      this method removes all the resources from the warehouse.

    • setWarehouse

      public void setWarehouse​(PlayerWarehouse newWarehouse)
      this method set all the resources in the warehouse, based on another warehouse you pass. If the warehouse you pass isn't valid it doesn't do anything (the warehouse won't change).
